directions.text: Coarsely grate potatoes and pat dry with a kitchen towel.
Heat 2 TBSP oil in a wok and fry potatoes for 10 mins, transfer to paper towels.
Chop bacon into small pieces and cook in wok till crisp.
Combine bacon, potatoes, rosemary, and nutmeg, set aside.
Using 1 TBSP oil fry eggs and place on top of potato composition.
